home.name: Duong Van Tien
home.about: I love crafting clean, elegant digital experiences and mastering multiple technologies to bring products to life.

about.title: About Me
about.desc1: I recently graduated in Software Engineering from Duy Tan University, and I am a full-stack developer with hands-on experience through projects like Sbay-Airplane, Pet Port, and Sakura Nihongo.
about.desc2: I am passionate about building modern web applications, focusing on user experience (UI/UX) and backend logic optimization. With a mindset of continuous learning, I always strive to improve my skills by working on team projects, solving real-world problems, and applying best practices.
about.desc3: Key achievements: GPA 3.58, Top 35 LG DREAM CODE 2025, AWS Cloud Practitioner Essentials certificate. I believe systematic thinking and a growth mindset are the keys to creating valuable products.

descriptions.sbay: Online flight booking platform, integrating many airlines, supporting search, price comparison and booking with optimal user experience.
descriptions.petport: Community platform for pet owners - sharing experiences, connecting services and secure payments via Stripe.
descriptions.sakura: Application connecting Japanese learners with learning resources and communities. Modern interface, synchronized backend and frontend.

contact.title: Let's connect and build something great
contact.desc: Do you have an interesting project, or need a dynamic developer to accompany you? Don't hesitate, I'm always ready to listen and help you realize your ideas.
